remarks: The closure of a set of expressions is a set of expressions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mclsval.d $e |- D = ( mDV ` T ) $.
mclsval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mclsval.c $e |- C = ( mCls ` T ) $.
mclsval.1 $e |- ( ph -> T e. mFS ) $.
mclsval.2 $e |- ( ph -> K C_ D ) $.
mclsval.3 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ E ) $.
mclsssv $p |- ( ph -> ( K C B ) C_ E ) $.
